data.Sentence_cn: 昨天我收到了姐姐的一封信，
data.Sentence: I had a letter from my sister yesterday.

data.Sentence_cn: 在信中她说她明年将到英国来。
data.Sentence: In her letter, she said that she would come to England next year.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果她来了，她会感到非常惊奇的。
data.Sentence: If she comes, she will get a surprise.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们现在住在乡间的一栋漂亮的新住宅里。
data.Sentence: We are now living in a beautiful new house in the country.

data.Sentence_cn: 这栋房子在我姐姐离开之前就已动工了，
data.Sentence: Work on it had begun before my sister left.
The house was completed five months ago.

data.Sentence_cn: 我在信中告诉她，她可以和我们住在一起。
data.Sentence: In my letter, I told her that she could stay with us.

data.Sentence_cn: 这栋房子里有许多房间，还有一个漂亮的花园。
data.Sentence: The house has many large rooms and there is a lovely garden.

data.Sentence_cn: 它是一栋非常现代化的住宅，因此在有些人看来很古怪。
data.Sentence: It is a very modern house, so it looks strange to some people.

data.Sentence_cn: 它肯定是这个地区唯一的一栋现代化住宅。
data.Sentence: It must be the only modern house in the district.
